text: valashar (, also Romanized as Vālāshāhr) is a city and capital of Jereh and Baladeh District, in Kazerun County, Fars Province, Iran. ==name change== The name of the city of Baladeh was officially changed to Valashehr in 2017 by the approval of the government. https://irna.ir/amp/83242804/جزئیات-تقسیمات-کشوری- در-استان-فارس(تغییر-نام-والاشهر) == References == Category:Cities in Kazerun County
title: Baladeh, Fars
